page.title: 12Women's Institute,Dinas
page.content:
{++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ {++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ {++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Dinas{Womens Institute}has been in existence for many years.We spoke to {Mrs.Coupland}of{Bryngollau,Dinas}and she told us a few things about the Dinas Branch.She has been a member for twelve years.
Some of the things they do are to{ {hold markets,give home help services, {hold coffee evenings and jumble sales. They meet monthly in our school hall and there are 34 members.
{++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ {++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ {++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
